name: Acorn Cop
description:
In Acorn Cop, you're taking a shooting test as a cop.

The rules are so simple:

- You must shoot and destroy all the acorns
- You must NOT shoot any of the humans and other living things (use your best judgment)
- Everything else you can shoot at will, some of them will be very useful when destroyed, and some are just collectibles
- Do not miss more than 2 acorns for 20 minutes and you win the game (a.k.a passing the test)

Controller guide:

- Flick LS to change aim assist target
- While you're slowing down by holding the LB button, ammo won't refill

Features:

  • Permadeath
  • Special items with unique effects like slowing time, clearing all the acorns on the screen, refilling ammos...
  • Collectible items
  • Classical music (makes violence classy)
  • Boss fight
  • Funny easter eggs
  • Achievements
